title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Heads of State," Front Side", ca. 1984
medium: Black and color marking pens, brush and watercolor (?) on heavy white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in balck markingpen in margin, lower right:  "Heads of State;" in margin, lower left:  8. [encircled]
description: Five panel screen on wheels with differently colored panels, each with motif on top.  From left to right:  yellow-striped panel with two, circular "eye" cut outs and globe on top; pink and red striped  panel with large circular cut out (one-half of which is on pink and red panel and one-half of which is on orange panel to right) with head wearing saw tooth crown; orange panel with thin black stripes in form of dashes, with saw tooth cut outs along right edge and head in form of red triangle; purple panel with red spiral pattern and head with two antenae on top; turquoise pnel with circular cut out in middle and head in blue with white cap of cartoon character on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Heads of State," Front Side", ca. 1984.
ca. 1984. Black and color marking pens, brush and watercolor (?) on heavy white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-122.
